unnormalised: Borem, mhaka dista hanv mhojea ghorachea lagichea petrol pumpachea lagim mazi scooty bhorthalom, barabor? ani Televiznacho pollyelea sogllea fuel efficiency ads babat mhaka vichar ailo. Te sogllea kmpl ani tem sogllen babat uloitha. tech pori, tem khorench kitem mhunta, tuzo vichar asa?
normalised: Borem asa, mhaka hanv gharache lagichea petrol pumpacher mhaji scooty bhorthalo, bare? Ani TV-cher tumi polltoleo te soglle fuel efficiency ads mhaka ulo aile. Te sodanch kilometer per liter ani te soglem jazz vixim uloytat. Tem koxem dista, tem sogllem mhunnlear khorench kitem, tumi zanno?

unnormalised: Poile suater, "kmpl" mhunllear kitem? mhaka dista tem kilometer prati liter. tech pori mojea mamaachi purani Maruti 800 kiteak 15 kmpl ditli asli. aazkaalik, novea gaddiyo mhunta tech pori 25 kmpl vo 30 kmpl! Tem ek vhoddlem ontor asa, barabor?
normalised: Poile suvater, "kilometer per liter" mhunnlear kitem astam? Mhaka dista tem kilometer per liter mhunn. Koxem mhajea kakachem purannem Maruti eight hundred ponda kilometer per liter ditalem tem disamni. Ajea disa, noveo gadiyo ponchvis kilometer per liter vo tis kilometer per liter astam mhunn sangtat! Tem ek vhoddlem vegllemponn asa, sorem?

unnormalised: Uprant petrol vs. diesel chi sangli vostu asa. Diesel gaddi chodd mileage dita mhunnta, tech pori na? pun tankam soglli pollution chi vostu ani BS6 ani kitem asa tench aikok mellta. mojea cousinan ek Tata Nexon diesel ghetli ani to mhunta tanka ekundren 22 kmpl sharant mellta. bore asa mhaka dista.
normalised: Magir petrol versus diesel sangata ek vhoddli vostu asa. Diesel gadiyo bori mileage ditat mhunn mhantaat, bare? Punn magir tumi sogllem pollution vishoy ani BS six ani kitem na tem aikta. Mhajea bhavponnan Tata Nexon diesel ghetlem, ani to sangta taka te sharant ponchvis kilometer per liter ditam. Bori zait mhunn dista.

unnormalised: Ani CNG babat vichar naka kortole! tem ekdum eco-friendly option zavnk zai. hanv ek auto-rickshaw cholovpi dusre disa pollyelea ani mhunta tanka CNG kit 35 kmpl tulya meltta. tech pori tem khorench chodd ascharya zavnchem asa, khas karann tankam kitlench dis bhor bhonvonk zai.
normalised: Ani CN-G vishim mhozo ulo suru korunk nant! Tem super eco-friendly option mhunn mantaat. Hanvem eka auto-rickshaw chaloka dusrea disa polloylo, to sangtalo tacho C-N-G kit taka tis ponda kilometer per liter equivalent ditam. Tem khorench bore bhaxechea asa, khas korun te dis bhor kitlem vhaddtat tem dhorun.

unnormalised: Aata, mazi scooty purani asa, pun mhaka vichar asa hanv 40 kmpl bore disak melovpacho asa. tech pori, hanv engine full speedan na cholovpaacho ani trafficani tas bhor ravonk zai. uprant tankam 30 kmpl poddta. Ugh, Mumbai traffic!
normalised: Ata, mhaji scooty ek purannim, punn mhaka dista hanv boro disak challis kilometer per liter melltolem. Khoimchea astana, hanv engine eka manaka bhaxen revive kortolea zagaar voilea zatolea ani traffic-ant gantan lagoon zatolea zagaar nant. Magir tem tin kilometer per liter kortalem mhunn dista. Ugh, Mumbai traffic!

unnormalised: Hanv aikola tire pressure fuel efficiencyak tras dita. tankam thoddi kami asa, kiteak 25 PSI? Mhaka tem check korchem poddtalem. kiteak tire pressure sarki kiteak asta? Konnak tori zata kai?
normalised: Hanvem aikonk asa tyre pressure-in-num fuel efficiency-ik vhadd ditalem. Tem thoim thodeam zagear unnem dista, ponchvis P-S-I asa? Mhaka thodeam zagear tem check korunk zai. Ani boro tyre pressure kitem? Konnaak zanna?

unnormalised: Pun khorench, fuel efficiency ek vostu asa tankam aami vichar koronk zai, barabor? petrol kimat uch zavnchi ani climate change vostunchea sangata , doreklai thoddi upyogi asa. aaz tuka petrol pumpacher asa, tuvem ek minit tuzo kmpl vichar koronk zai ani koxi tuka ek literaki chodd mellounk melltta.
normalised: Punn khorench, fuel efficiency mhunnlear ami soglleamni ulo korunk zai, bare? Petrol-ache dam vhaddta ani sogllem climate change-ache vishay ami korta, tem kitem ami kortalem. Tech bhaxen tumi petrol pump-acher asta tumi thoddo vell tumche kilometer per liter ani koxem tumi litrak kittleo vostu kaadta tumi thodyo vostu vixim ulounk zai.

unnormalised: Kityak aaz, tem mhojem fuel efficiency brain dump disabharan asa. Aata, hanv he crazy traffic sodunk zai! Mhaka lucky zavnk sang. ani soglyank surakshiten cholovnk sangtat!
normalised: Koxem, mhaji fuel efficiency brain dump ajjea disachi. Ata, vapis hea pagle traffic-ant zavon di! Mhaka subham di. Ani yad dhorunk zai tumi boro gadi chalounk zai, tumi soglle!
